name: Sea of Survivors
description:
Embark on an endless voyage in Sea of Survivors. Fight off hordes of Swashbucklers and Sea Monsters. Uncover rare treasures with mysterious curses, and use them to forge a build that improves your chances of survival. Challenge yourself, defeat epic bosses, and use the booty you collect to grow your power by upgrading your ship and hiring a crew.


  • Action-packed 20-minute runs with epic bosses to defeat
  • Hand-pixeled artwork and a bespoke original soundtrack
  • Earn loot and rewards from every run, even when you sink
  • Control your direction, but you can’t stop moving
  • Hire a crew of skilled pirates and sailors with unique abilities

  • Game-changing curses and treasures to discover

  • Spend your doubloons with the shipwright to upgrade your ship



  • Explore multiple exciting map biomes filled with distinct factions and events
  • Captain a fleet of unique ships
  • Bounties and Steam Achievements
